title.rendered: Remodeling shares the benefits of stone veneer

content.rendered: Used as a resource for small business owners and contractors in the light commercial and residential remodeling industry, Remodeling shares that stone veneer offers one of the highest return on investment in an online article titled, “Buyers’ Guide: Manufactured Stone Veneer.” The article shares the 2015 Cost vs. Value Report which states that stone veneer recoups 92.2% of its cost, making a stone veneer accent the second most valuable home improvement project behind steel door entry replacements.
